summary.span: 表示当前 HTTP 请求的安全信息，包括角色成员资格。

span.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象实现 接口，并表示 HTTP 请求的当前安全上下文。The object implements the interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request. 启用角色管理后 (请参阅 ) ，将 对象分配 到 的属性 。When role management is enabled (see ), the assigns a object to the property of the . 类公开当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识，另外还会对角色成员身份执行检查。The class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership. 如果 为 `true` ，则 对象管理缓存的角色列表，并首先在缓存列表中查找当前用户的角色成员身份，然后查找角色 。If is `true`, then the object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role . 如果 为 `false` ，则 对象始终使用角色提供程序查找角色成员身份。If is `false`, the object always looks up role membership using the role provider. 对象对在基于标识的 cookie 中缓存的角色信息进行加密和解密 。The object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the based on the .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否修改了利用 对象缓存的角色名称的列表。

span.span: if the list of role names cached with the object has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性将 `true` 在从默认角色检索角色名称并将其 添加到缓存中后返回 ，或在 方法调用 默认角色提供程序的方法并收到响应时返回 `true` ，导致角色名称传递到要 添加到缓存的方法。The property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role and added to the cache by the method, or when the method calls the method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the method being added to the cache. 如果 设置为且已通过，则属性也将返回 true `true` ，从而导致设置新的 。The property will also return true if is set to `true` and the has passed, resulting in a new being set. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，则以下示例显示当前用户的角色缓存信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅 类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The list of roles that the is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，并且已为表示的用户缓存了角色名称 ，则 方法将返回用户所属的缓存中的角色名称列表。If is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the , then the method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of. 如果尚未缓存角色名称，则 方法将从默认角色返回用户所属角色名称的列表 。If role names have not been cached, then the method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role . 仅返回当前的角色名称 。Only role names for the current are returned. 若要确定是否已在对象中缓存角色名称 ，请检查 属性。To determine whether role names have been cached in the object, check the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示登录的用户是其成员的角色。The following code example displays the roles that the logged-on user is a member of. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由 表示的用户是否扮演指定的角色。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果由 表示的用户扮演指定的角色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先检查 属性，以确定当前用户的角色名称缓存列表是否可用。 first checks the property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available. 如果 属性为，则将 `true` 检查指定角色的缓存列表。If the property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role. 如果 方法在缓存列表中找到指定的角色，则返回 `true` 。If the method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`. 如果 找不到指定的角色，它将调用 默认实例的方法， 以确定用户名是否与数据源中的角色关联 。If does not find the specified role, it calls the method of the default instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查登录的用户是否属于 "管理员" 角色，然后允许用户查看用户角色。The following code example checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#8)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户的角色列表是否已缓存在 Cookie 中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果角色名称已缓存在 Cookie 中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 `cacheRolesInCookie` 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性设置为 `true` ，则当检查特定角色的用户成员身份时，会将当前用户的角色名称列表写入 cookie。If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked. 属性指示是否已向 cookie 写入角色名称。The property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie. 请注意，即使 `cacheRolesInCookie` 配置属性可能是 `true` ，在 `true` 角色信息写入 cookie 后，属性才会返回。Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie. 如果没有为用户执行任何角色检查， 则将返回 `false` 。If no role checks are performed for a user, will return `false`. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，则以下示例显示当前用户的角色缓存信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅 类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取存储和检索用户角色信息的角色提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

value.span: 存储和检索用户角色信息的角色提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开角色提供程序的名称，该提供程序管理对象表示的用户的角色信息 。The property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the object. 这使你可以通过使用类的属性访问用户的特定角色提供程序实例， 而不管提供程序是否是应用程序的默认提供程序。This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the property of the class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，你可以创建一个采用作为输入的方法， 并返回所表示用户的角色列表。For example, you may create a method that takes a as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user. 可以 通过 从 属性值编制索引的集合中调用角色提供程序的方法，确保使用适当的角色提供程序返回的角色的列表 。You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the by calling the method of the role provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value. 若要填充 每个请求的对象，必须使用 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中定义的事件处理程序。To populate the object for each request, you must use a event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.

summary.span: 获取角色 Cookie 的版本号。

span.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

value.span: 角色 Cookie 的版本号。

span.span: The version number of the roles cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在角色 cookie 中包含版本号，ASP.NET 的未来版本可以修改角色 cookie 的格式，并使用 属性来区分不同的格式。By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the property to distinguish between different formats. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，则以下示例显示当前用户的角色缓存信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅 类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]
